item.title: Shoppy HTB Walkthrough
item.author: emdwyer
item.description: Intro I have been spending some time over the holiday break working on CTF challenges - including both Hack The Box, PicoCTF and learning a little binary exploitation. Taking notes for my own review & learning seemed like a good opportunity to post up CTF walkthroughs and get back into the habit of blogging again. So, here is the first of hopefully many walkthroughs I will post up as time permits, and when machines on Hack The Box are retired.
